SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
: SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Network Name or UUID" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_KVM_NW_NAME_UUID# : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!Prepare Command : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = "virsh net-info"
!VM name or UUID : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_KVM_NW_NAME_UUID# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_NW_NAME_ESCAPED# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : SET &UC4RB_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CMD#, " &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#")
:PRINT "Command Executed :: &UC4RB_CMD#"
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** GET NETWORK INFO ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** GET NETWORK INFO ACTION FAILED ********"
echo ""
&UC4RB_CMD#
execcode=$? if [ $execcode -ne 0 ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit $execcode fi
xml=`virsh net-dumpxml &UC4RB_NW_NAME_ESCAPED#`
execcode=$? if [ $execcode -ne 0 ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR exit $execcode fi
echo UC4RB_KVM_NW_XML::=$xml echo "" !------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_KVM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_KVM_NW_XML# = ""
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_KVM_*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: IF &KEY# EQ "UC4RB_KVM_NW_XML" : SET &UC4RB_KVM_NW_XML# = "&VALUE#" : ENDIF
: ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_KVM_NW_XML#,,"WORKFLOW"
